name: Infernoble Knight - Ogier
text:
A monster equipped with this card cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Infernoble Knight - Ogier" once per turn.
? If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 FIRE Warrior monster or 1 "Noble Arms" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Infernoble Knight - Ogier".
? If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Warrior monster you control; equip this card to that target.
